        List<Post> getPosts(int numberOfPosts,
                    Long startIndex)
             throws AppException
        Parameters:
        orderByInsertionDate - - if set, it represents the order by criteria (ASC or DESC) for displaying posts
        numberDaysToLookBack - - if set, it represents number of days to look back for posts, null
        Returns:
        list with posts corresponding to search criteria
